adjectives.description: alonely (comparative alonelier or more alonely, superlative aloneliest or most alonely)

description: From Middle English aloonly, alonly, al only, equivalent to alone +‎ -ly, or more strictly, all- +‎ one  +‎ -ly.

adverbs.description: alonely (comparative alonelier or more alonely, superlative aloneliest or most alonely)

examples: This said spirit was not given alonely unto him, but unto all his heirs and posterity.
